data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in North and Middle Andaman, Andaman and Nicobar, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of North and Middle Andaman, Andaman and Nicobar, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of North and Middle Andaman, Andaman and Nicobar, India the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.section_summary: On average, 353 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in North and Middle Andaman, Andaman and Nicobar, India.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Please, convict the 1,843,456 believers in North and Middle Andaman, Andaman and Nicobar, India to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 1,843,456 believers find a person of peace today among the 165,743,441 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Chaura people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, defend your people in the county of North and Middle Andaman against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 163,710,059, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.focus_label: North and Middle Andaman, Andaman and Nicobar, India
data.section_summary:
the county of North and Middle Andaman, Andaman and Nicobar, India has a population of 167,586,900.

We estimate North and Middle Andaman has 1,843,456 people who might know Jesus, 2,033,382 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 163,710,059 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of North and Middle Andaman.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
